alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 8:06PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian and east central Le Flore Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 806 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Fanshawe to 7 miles north of Muse. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Wister... Howe... Hartford... Cameron... Heavener Runestone State Park... Lake Wister State Park... Patterson... Hodgen... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
